DOC.criteria: woman least 18 year age ; first diagnosis Stage IV breast cancer recurrent diagnosis metastatic breast cancer , interval since diagnosis ; ability complete intervention assessment English ; willingness attend inperson PCO workshop ; male ( men constitute less 1 % breast cancer patient , number would sufficient reliable analysis ) ; local ( i.e. , breast , surgical scar , chest wall ) regional ( i.e. , lymph node ) recurrent disease ; use personal website post cancerrelevant material past six month
